author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Members of Democratic Youth Federation of India (DYFI) staged a demonstration in front of the District Collectorate here on Monday condemning the police action against the DYFI and AIDWA members, who were staging demonstration demanding the shifting of the TASMAC retail outlet functioning on the busy Cherry road.

Action sought

They also demanded action against the police officials who attacked the DYFI and AIDWA members on that day.

They also demanded the police to withdraw the cases booked against the DYFI and AIDWA members.
title: DYFI members stage demonstration
